field.name: summary
field.value: FileAssemblyViewSourceLoader includes hidden/source control files in operation

field.name: description
field.value:
FileAssemblyViewSourceLoader.CollectViewsOnFileSystem includes ALL files in the directory. This is problematic if you are using source control or have some other files that should not be included for Monorail operations. See this thread for one example of this problem: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_thread/thread/6fcfbcdb8341dc2d
The supplied patch allows file extensions to be passed to the appropriate methods to filter the GetFiles call in the viewSourceLoader implementation. To test, it adds a file to the test site and updates tests for the ListViews() method of the viewSourceLoader. All pass after this update.
Brail is currently responding to any changes in subversion folders within the /views directory as a result of this bug, recompiling on any svn operation.
